item.title: Serializing Hashes
item.description: We use the PHC string format, as defined here, to format password hashes produced by libpasta. These take the following format: $<id>[$<param>=<value>(,<param>=<value>)*][$<salt>[$<hash>]] where: <id> is the symbolic name for the function <param> is a parameter name <value> is a parameter value <salt> is an encoding of the salt <hash> is an encoding of the hash output The string is then the concatenation, in that order, of:
